ee api perahara balanna nuwara giya dawasakayi.api kiwwe aariyi mamayi apata enna kiyala aaradhana kale guruge.gura ee perahara kale nuwara tawume koka kola kada kipayak badu aragena thibuna.nuwara giya api gurath munagahila tawume awidimin iddi ookid pala saha athu wikunamin hitapu wayasaka manussayek dakka.ee mamath mal wawamin hitiya kalayak nisa api ee minihath ekka kathawata watuna.para ayine mal pala wikunana kawuruth ganan ganne nathi wayasaka manussayek unata ohuge udbhida widya danima hari ihalayi kiyala therum gannata apata wadi wela gathawune na.ookid wawana ho wawena usa pramanayath mal hataganimath athara pahadili sambandhathawak thiyenawa kiyala ohu apith ekka kiwwa.api ohuth ekka boho welawak katha karamin indala chuti muna gahenna bogambara hiragedarata giya.
